original_text: As the dew of Hermon, and as the dew that descended upon the mountains of Zion: for there the Lord commanded the blessing, even life for evermore.
korean_text: 헐몬의 이슬이 시온의 산들에 내림 같도다 거기서 여호와께서 복을 명령하셨나니 곧 영생이로다

sentences.original_text: and as the dew that descended upon the mountains of Zion:
for there the Lord commanded the blessing,
